column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I initially went for these pants as I love the design from the stitching. However, after one or two wears they lost all elasticity in the hips, butt and upper thigh region. I was even filmed teaching a yoga class and was shocked when I watched the video playback to see me constantly trying to hike up my pants over and over again - overly disappointed in this particular pair of leggings which is a same as the stitching design is bang on

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I LOVED these -- the way they fit, the way they feel, how flattering they are...but I wore them maybe 15 times, followed the washing instructions, worked out in them maybe 6-7 times ONLY and they've already ripped!! This happened to another pair of my lulu leggings -- for 100 dollars I'm just SAD

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: So cute! They hold in all my leg fat so nicely and make the shape look great

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Perfect material, just enough high rise, and the seams accentuate all the right things!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I loved these leggings when I tried them on. They truly did fit in all the right places, with no seam in the front and a very comfortable waistband on the tummy, which was a huge selling point for me. Not to mention the sole reason I got them was for pockets! However, I was so disappointed that I spent the whole time wearing these, pulling them up every few minutes. They fit fine still and look amazing, but honestly isn't worth the very pricey amount when there are many other brands that stay up fantastic in and out of the gym. I've already worn and washed them so I can't return them for another pair that stays up better. Frustrating, especially for the quality you think you are paying for.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear kristallison4,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the All The Right Places Pant II. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'February 5, 2019'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love these leggings!!! This is my second pair of lululemon leggings and the fit and fabric on these is even better than my first pair.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought two pairs of these leggings in black, size 4 (I have a 25" waist). At the time when trying it on in the store, the leggings seemed to fit perfectly, however after wearing them to a workout session, then washing them (I followed the care instructions correctly: gentle wash, no drying machine), I must say that I am incredibly disappointed in the fabric and quality of these leggings. I am *constantly* pulling up the waistband now and this is just if I wear them out on a walk to do errands. Wearing them to the gym is even worse, and half the time of my workout I spend pulling them up. These do NOT fit like a second skin at all, there is a bunch of creasing behind my knees even when I stand straight and they feel quite loose now around my ankles. Incredibly disappointing, especially for a pair of leggings that are $128+ after tax.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear ayanna1993,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I absolutely loved these pants! I am definitely going to get more in other colors! I love leggings with pockets in them.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Good at first, but then waist band stretched out
column6: I loved these leggings when I first bought them, I got a size 6 and I'm 145 lbs 5'6 and that is the size I always purchase. They fit perfectly and were my go to for a few months. I washed them as instructed and never dried. Now, I literally cannot wear these leggings anymore. I tried to wear them a few days ago and was constantly pulling them up. They do not stay up at the waist band and are not snug anymore at all. I know I am not a size 4 because I tried this size on too before I purchased a 6 and I couldn't even get the 4 over my thighs/butt. I am so sad that the waist band stretched out, especially for the price :(
column14: fit good for first month or two

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Love the fit and feel of these , i own about 6 pairs at this point and will continue to buy them!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"

Today I put them on and realized that they are completely sheer in the butt and knees. Super disappointing considering these should still be "new" condition and I spent way more than other legging brands. I would never buy these leggings again.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Literally fits perfect in all the right places without feeling too tight or restrictive. They feel great and get tons of compliments on the reg. May get another pair just to have more colors!

I’m disappointed with these leggings.

column6: This tight is not only for women for men's too very good fit like second skin good support and compression for jogging and running, if you like good compression order one size smaller, maybe Lululemon need sell this tight for women and men.
column14: all fit fabric and the front no seems.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I loved these pants at first and was really excited about them, but I'm pretty disappointed. I've only worn them a couple times because they slip down as I move so I have to constantly pull them up. I wore them around campus all day and went to the gym after class, only to realize (after my workout) that they are completely sheer under the lights and you could see everything. I'm pretty embarrassed and really disappointed that I now own a very expensive pair of pants I can't wear. Check yourself in the mirror before you wear these out of the house!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Love all the features of these pants ... from the side pockets, to the snugness at the tummy, to the reflective edging at the ankles -- but most of all for no seam at the crotch!!! Please add this feature to more pants -- such a thoughtful feature. I am between sizes in these pants -- my recommendation is to size down if you are in the same boat. The smaller size stays up better in yoga.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Like the name says,” they hold you in all the right places”. My husband said they fit the best of all my tights!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Falls down during workouts and shows sweat
column6: I have the cropped version of these pants and they are on the expensive side. The material of these pants stretches out VERY easily and even though i got my usual size 4, they start to fall down even when i am doing daily activities, let alone cardio and HIIT workouts. During workouts, the band rolls down, the pants fall down so i am constantly adjusting, and the material shows sweat easily. The design of the leggings are nice but i am truly disappointed in the quality of these leggings, ESPECIALLY for the price.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Absolutely love my new lulu pants. They are snug, but that is how i like them. perfect to work out in and stylish to be dressed down for a comfy girls night. very night fit overall
column15: reflective strip on the inside of the bottom seem

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I loved the color, and fit was as expected but I ended up returning these.... props to Lulu for taking them back! During my workout I noticed that sweat was visible around my crotch area and the back of my knees. I've learned the hard way not to wear yoga pants when working up a sweat (as it'll look like you peed your pants), but these pants are designed for "training". Maybe its just me... maybe its the color... either way just a warning for those of you planning to wear these while working out intensely!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These pants did not provide the "held-in" feel from the start. They were always sliding down, so I really wore them for to/from rather than exercise because I was constantly having to pull them up or the inseam would be halfway down my thigh. But now, the seams all over the front of the pants are coming loose/threads are coming out. I feel that any day they will literally open at the seams because the stitching is of such poor quality. I just bought them a few months ago, would have expected much longer use that I have seen with my other Lulu tights.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"

column6: The pants are gorgeous and hold me in all the places they should. Really disappointed, I feel like for the money I shouldn't be forced to use them as lounge pants because they will NOT stay up for a workout.

column6: Love the fit of these. Lift and hold in all the right places. The cel phone pocket makes them so functional!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I truly want to give these pants 5 stars. They have such a flattering look that they immediately became my favorite pair of lulus. However, they very quickly stretch out. I saw some of the warnings in other reviews and hoped that with careful care, I would never experience the same issues, but unfortunately, these pants sag and slide even just during day-to-day wear, let alone during a workout. I can't wear them to classes without having to pull them up every 5 minutes and it's very disappointing. I'd love to see these pants in a more durable fabric, but for the price these were sadly not worth the low quality.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I ordered the size arrordimg to the sizing chart, when it arrived it was too small I had to return it for a size up.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Hi! i want to start off by saying i love these pants. i bought the galaxy blue in store a couple of weeks ago and love the color and fit. However, I've only worn them twice and yesterday i noticed that part of the fabric is pulling apart on my bottom area. I am more disappointed with how lulu handled my issue when i contacted via text yesterday because i know things happen and not every article of clothing is perfect. I messaged lulu to let them know what happened after only 2 wears and the solution was to send me a label to send them back to lulu where in a couple of weeks once the warehouse processes they will send me an e-gift card for the item and then i can repurchase. It just seems a little backwards since at that point they might not have the right size/color in stock anymore. The response i got to that was to go ahead and spend $128 on another pair. I have worn lulu for many years and have never had issues. Just disappointed in how this was handled.

I worked out in them a second time today and am terribly disappointed with how loose they feel. I had to pull the waistband up throughout my entire class and they are stretched out in the knees.

Such a letdown.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I've heard so much about how good these leggings look and shape, I had to get them. Well, it's only been a few months of having them and taking extra precaution with washing instructions to ensure longevity. However, upon putting them on today they ripped a hole right down the middle. I know my sizing and it is not an issue of the fit as they are a good fit. The quality just doesn't hold up, and I think this is unacceptable for the price you pay for these leggings. It is disappointing to know that I have leggings from cheaper brands like VS and F21 that I have had for years and do not take extra care of them. I am not one to speak wrongly on anything, and if I express dissatisfaction it is truly because something went very wrong.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Wanted to love them, but couldn't.
column6:
I wanted to love these leggings! I loved them in store and the way they held you in all over.
Got them home and as I was running and doing yoga in them, they continually fell down and I had to pull them up so many times during a workout. The waistband rolls down slightly for yoga, but not as big as a deal as the high waist slipping down and sagging in the butt. Then the first time I washed them, the seams were all pilled, unlike any of my other Lulu leggings! So they look ratty and are starting to come apart at the seams already (I've had them about 4 months.) Overall, a bummer.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: The photo on the model shows the pants ended at the ankle/ slightly above it. When I got the pants they are too long. They bundle at the foot. I am 5’9”. I’ve order pants this size/ length before from lululemon and they fit perfectly. So sadly I am going to return these pants.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
These r by far my absolute favorite
I have had 4 knee surgeries and they help with my persistent swelling. Due to the extra compression these offer they provide stability and comfort.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought my first pair over a year ago, as a recommendation from a store employee. I absolutely adore these for running (and just wearing around the house). After a few months, I put a hole in the knee (completely my fault) and sewed them up and they still work fine. I follow all of the instructions for care and maintenance and have come across no issues. A year later, and I’ve purchased my second pair of the “All The Right Places.” I’ve got a couple other pairs of Lulus, but these are my favorite. I love that they stay up while running and how they give support where you need. They are a little more expensive, but I think they are so worth it. I would definitely recommend giving them a try.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Size down for these cozy pants to avoid them sliding off. My first pair in my standard size slid down like crazy when walking long distances, so I just travel & lounge in them instead of working out. After sizing down, I've picked them up in a few colors and adore the pockets on the sides that hold my phone and the comfort they deliver for travel, long walks, yoga and pilates.
column15: watch the size standard size slides down

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
First of all my entire workout wardrobe is lulu. I'm a huge fan and loyal customer. That said these current ATRP pants are horrible. This is the 3nd pair I have. I loved them for several reasons but mostly the secure fit and held in sensation. Unlike my last two pairs all these do is slide down.
I purchased these for cross fit and running but just have to pull them up constantly which was not the case with the earlier editions. All of them are a size 6 so it's not a sizing problem. I can only guess there's a quality of fabric issue. They do seem thinner than my older pair also the waistband which looks fine just doesn't stay up. Regardless now I own a pair of $140.00 leggings that I can't even work out in.
Signed, one disappointed loyal customer

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love these pants. Great fit + nice material for hot yoga/pilates.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: High-Waist rolls down and fabric isn't as good quality as other lululemon pants
column6: I have several lululemon pants and loved them, so I was very excited to try this pair, I still wanted the same compression/second-skin feel of the Wunder Under...but I was sadly disapointed, they don't have much compression and the waist rolls down so I have to keep pulling it up when I work out. they also start loosing the little tightness they have to begin with as you workout. Tthe fabric is very see-through and some of the seams are coming apart. Already worn them so can't exchange, very disappointed specially given the price tag.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought two pairs (black and purple) because I heard that these were “good quality leggings”; however, I just wasted my money purchasing these and now am out of almost $300! They fit well in the fitting room, but after working out with them, they constantly fall down whenever I run, and occasionally fall down when I am weight-lifting. I’ve only worn them a handful of times, and they are virtually unwearable at this point. I am 5’8”, 140lbs and bought a size 8. I couldn’t size down to a 6 because they were way too tight around my thighs and see-through. Even when I attempted calling the store to see if there was anything I could do, I had to call 4 different stores because they put me on hold for almost 10 minutes, so I eventually just hung up. Poor quaility leggings, and poor customer service.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Love the style, didn't hold up
column6: I haven't had these leggings for that long, and the seam is already unraveling. I loved the style of these leggings and was so disappointed that they haven't held up!!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wanted to love these for long-term. But after a few wears, they loosen up throughout the day and starts falling. The waistband also folds over and doesn't stay up.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: All the right places if you don't move
column6: I love the thickness of the fabric and the beautiful eggshell color. The fit is TTS and looks great on, but once I started to move in them they kept slipping down at the waist and down through the thighs/crotch. I am a true 6 and would certainly not go down in size. I spent my entire tennis match pulling them up! I guess I will only be able to wear them for hanging out.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wanted these tights for Christmas and I was so excited when I got them! They fit so well and I absolutely love the color! Unfortunately I've only worn them twice and the seams are coming unraveled. I have over 10 pairs of lulu leggings and this is the first time I've noticed them coming apart so quickly. They're great leggings, I just wish they were made a little better :(

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I was so excited to get these for Christmas because they are the most hyped up Lululemon legging. For $128 you'd think they'd be magically...but they are far from it. I typically wear a 6 in their pants (occasionally sizing down to a 4). When I put them on for the first time I was shocked by how sheer the top and back panels are. The fabric became shiny and as soon as I stood up my thighs immediately felt uncomfortable. The two seams rub together and chafing is inevitable. I'm not sure how these are classified as a running pant. I'm not sure if there is something wrong with this fabric, but the entire time I wore them my inner and upper thighs burned. I'm not sure if it's because I didn't wash them before wearing them....but make sure you try them on in store and don't buy online!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I've had these leggings for a the last few months, and at first I really loved them! However, after a few uses I noticed that the top of the pants and the crotch would sag down and would need to be pulled up. I bought my regular size in lulu which is a 6, I only wear them once a week, and I follow the care instructions...but alas, the longevity of these leggings are still are not what I expected for a $128 pair of leggings to be. Its such a shame because they really look amazing on....maybe if you decide to get these size down from your regular size so that you can account for the inevitable loss of shape at the waist and crotch.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I have had these leggings for 7 months now and its safe to say they are my least favorite pair to wear. they are snug, almost too tight and easily give me a camel toe. column6: I have 7 pairs of these pants. I purchased my first pair a few years ago and will never buy anything else because these work so well. I am 135lbs 5'6 and normally would wear a 26/6 in pants but I get a 4 in these; I like them snug and I've noticed that they hold their tightness after numerous washes if I get them on the snug side. I wish they came in more colors!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: The All the Right Places leggings are shaping, incredibly squat proof and have pockets. Though a part of me wants to defend these leggings because they are very flattering, the truth is I have a few reservations. First, these leggings pill easily and rip even with the recommended care. I have gone through 3 pairs of leggings this past year. They rip in between the thigh or in the buttock area. While these leggings do provide a hugged sensation,they ride down. This is inconvenient because it takes away support from the areas it is intended to compress and disrupts my workout. Overall, these leggings are not meeting my expectations. Yes, I do think these leggings offer a great deal of support and wear beautifully, but they are less reliable than I remember.

column6: Great fit, long enough to look normal....I'm 5'11'' and 150 lbs, and the 10 fits well. The material is smooth and compressive in the right places.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love this product. it is comfortable, posh and the material is very nice, light but strong. A winner overall.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: loved these leggings! this is my first purchase ever from lululemon and i’ll defineretely be getting more leggings from them in the future. the material is thick enough so they’re definerely squat proof for leg day! the high rise is actually high and goes over my belly button. fits a little snug but because of that it really defines your legs! definetely a great buy! im 112lbs, 5’3, and i wear a size 4 in these leggings, i reccomend going up a size then your normal size

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Just What I've Been Looking For!
column6: I'm really impressed with the quality of these leggings after trying on leggings from other athletic brands. The $128 price tag may seem expensive but they're worth it! Instead of buying 3-4 $30 leggings, you can buy one quality pair and curb fast-fashion waste and help the environment. I bought these in black, size 6 since I don't like my leggings too tight. For reference, I'm about 5'5, 115lbs and have shorter legs and the inseam fits perfectly and not too long. These will be my go-to work out leggings all winter. Thank you lulu!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: The ONLY pair I haven't loved
column6: I own roughly 10 different kinds of Lulu leggings...this is the ONLY pair I do not love. Ironically, I find them all wrong in all the wrong places. The seams arent flattering, and the material is see-throughish and doesnt compress well or provide a comfortable feel. They show ANY imperfections you may have- cellulite! and make bulges all over. I wore them once to give them a chance through a workout, so sadly now I can't return them and I'm stuck with them. Again, the ONLY pair I do not recommend at ALL. I am 5'3" and 120ish. Size 4's always fit like a glove. These just did not work for me at all. I'm sad I spent the money.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These are so flattering and versatile that I have them in two colors and two lengths. I love the detailing, the pockets, and the reflective cuff. Someone asks me about them almost every time I wear them. I would wear them every day if I could. Great to wear under sweaters and sweatshirts for fall or to wear to the gym. My only complaint is they sometimes ride down my hips especially for running unlike some other Lulus that stay out better.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I received these as a gift from my friend and my very first time wearing them to the gym I discovered they were completely see through... thoroughly embarrassed to say the least. Not sure if I can return or do an exchange because I don't have a receipt for the gift.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Dani2323,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 9, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
These are by far my favorite pants for all occasions. Daytime. Going out, yoga, air travel, safari!!! I always get at least 3.
I wash them by hand and line dry. If after a while there is pilling along the seams i use a cashmere shaver and they are like new. They last a year when I wear them daily!!
They are great for flying as a support for the body!!The phone side pickets are an i cannot do without!!
Luxtreme material is my favirite of all!!
Pls continue making them always and Long inseam!!
Thank You

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Silky smooth pants but little shaping
column6:
I own 12+ pairs of Lululemon leggings, and I would have to say these come in smack in the middle of my faves. I like the more hugged sensation from Wunder Unders, as opposed to the naked feeling of Align's. These ones fit a little more like Aligns - they don't really lift the butt or shape as well as WU's. However, the side pockets are convenient for phone stashing, I love the high waist, and the fabric is oh so silky.
Training - My training includes mostly crossfit type exercise, as well as spin classes. These pants do NOT stay as well in place as WU's. The silky smooth fabric tends to slip down lower during training, so it's up to you to hike it back up in place.
Sizing - I am an athletic but slightly more pear-shaped size 8, 150lbs and 5'9". These fit true to size and are 100% squat proof. Hit me mid-ankle.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Love this pant generally, but sweat is visible
column6: I have these pants in navy and ADORE them. This green color is just as form fitting and flattering but because it's on the lighter side, if you drip sweat onto them it will be visible. I think for a lighter color like this I'd prefer a thicker , more sweat absorbent material. Would absolutely recommend this pant in a darker color, however.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Fantastic looking pants that are as functional as they are chic!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Unfortunately these leggings ended up not being high rise at all on me even though the other leggings I’ve purchased from lulu that have been described as high rise have fit fine. I’m 5’ 9” so I’m sure for shorter girls these leggings fit great but I wouldn’t recommend them to taller girls or girls with long torsos. Love the side pockets though and am hoping to see them on more styles!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Devonrae,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We hear where you're coming from and I'm sorry to hear your pants weren't what you expected. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I've sent you an email to follow up. Best wishes!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 6, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Favorite Leggings, be careful when hemming!
column6: LOVE LOVE these babies, I wear them to the gym and to travel. The material is thick enough for CrossFit but also comfortable enough to travel all day in them. The only qualm I have is when I got them hemmed at Lulu I hemmed it at the ankle but because I'm so short it flares ever so slightly now. :( Wish Lulu had a petite size! Other than that, they are amazing!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I was really worried about the sizing because they are my first Lululemon leggings, But after talking with one the workers on the chatroom she let me know they could help with the return if they were too big. I am 5'9" 140 Lbs, and I usually wear size 6 in American Eagle jeans. I purchased a size 6 in these and they fit great. I have only washed them once, and they still feel great. hopefully they last.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Do you want everyone to see everything?
column6: I purchased these online so I had no way of knowing until I tried them on at home but these are NOT SQUAT PROOF, going up stairs-proof, bending over to set down your bag on a bench-proof, or getting into the car-proof. And I got dark colors so I cant even imagine what the lighter colors would be like. The sheerness of this material is so terrible, just barely a step above the sheerness of dance or ballet leggings. These leggings have so many other things going for them, the cut of the material is awesome, very flattering and I am living for the removal of the front seam. I love the idea of focused compression, my backside does look amazing. And the colors are so pretty. Unfortunately, I am not spending this much money to prance around the gym just for the sake of being marveled at as living art. I need gym clothes to function! If you are the type to wear makeup to the gym and not even break a sweat then I guess these are for you. I would imagine the MOMENT you start sweating it would not only show through the material but would get all over whatever you are sitting on or bump up against. When I go... I go hard, personal training, spin, rock-climbing, and hiking on the weekends. I really wanted these to work, but the LAST thing I need to worry about is everyone seeing my... details.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These pants are the best. That suck everything in literally "In All The Right Places." They are great for yoga or just to run errands in. They are my favorite fit.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I absolutely adore these leggings. So much so that I have several pairs of them. I love the fit of them, the pockets and the colors available. I wear them for numerous types of physical activity. From yoga, to running, to everyday wear. I recommend these leggings to anybody.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I have serval different types of Lululemon pants and never have had any trouble with the quality of the pants. These pants are not the same as the previous ones that I have purchased. The pants are very thin, no compression, and almost see-through. I would not recommend these particular pants, and I am disappointed in the quality vs price of the product.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Amitie,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear the All The Right Places Pant II is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and would love to sort this out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 3, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Perfect all around.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I had always heard how amazing the lulu leggings were and I finally ordered these. So glad I did! I’ve never worn a better pair of leggings! Love the fit! I would highly recommend!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I absolutely love these tights. This is my second pair, I purchased my first pair almost 2 years ago and still love them too! The style lines and pockets are my favorite, and they feel so soft. They also really make me feel tucked in and are very flattering. They will stretch out a little eventually but with two years of wear, I would expect that. Highly recommend for anything from running, to crossfit, to climbing to errands. A little thick for a bikram class though.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wanted so badly to love these! The material is great quality and doesn't pill as some other Lulu leggings do. The fabric also does not attract animal hair, which as a pet owner is a huge plus. In the store these looked great, but after only one or two wears they stretched out so much I am now unable to wear them. I wish I had known to buy a size or two down. Overall I would not recommend these because the sizing is deceiving and they seemed to lose elasticity quickly. They look very unflattering now and are not at all practical for a workout.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi missmiss,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We hear where you're coming from and I'm sorry to hear your pants haven't held up for you as expected. We'd love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 1, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Love the fit and flexibility

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Want to know what it is like to set $128 on fire?
column6:
I should have listened to the reviews. But the pants looked so beautiful and full of promise.
They fit great (I'm consistently a 6 in lulu pants), so I removed the tag, washed per directions, and put them on for a workout today. The ankle area became SO baggy and sloppy looking after minutes. I was continually tugging at them to get them back in place - the waist fits well but sags, the legs bunch. Just super awful. I love lulu, but this pant is poorer in fit and quality than my Old Navy or 90 Degree pants which are much more affordable. When I splurge, I expect the items to be durable and worth the price - these pants are neither. These will sit in my closet, only to be worn on laundry day. Such a waste, and such a huge disappointment.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi estaeben,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. I'm going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards the next steps. Talk soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 29, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Amazing leggings that shape you in all the right ways. And also perform well in even the hottest workouts. Flattering for everyday and for workout.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These are my go-to pants. When I'm unsure of what type of workout I'm feeling up to, no matter what activity I'm doing these pants never let me down. They are super functional and super flattering so not only am I super comfortable but I also feel great in them.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Fall down - not good running tights
column6:
I hate to leave a negative review after having such wonderful customer service from Lululemon, but these tights are not right for running. After reviewing the size chart I purchased a size 6, even though that was slightly smaller than what was recommended. These leggings fit very loose for “tights”. I have to pull them up every couple minutes without fail while I am running. The tights offer no compression whatsoever. The waistband is so loose that I could wear these while pregnant (keep in mind I actually ordered on the SMALL side). Aesthetically the style and seam placements are perfect, but the functionality is not there. If you are a runner, opt for the “Speed up” tight.
For size reference, I am 5’8” and 147lbs with a wider waist post baby.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey runningmom25,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 27, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
I was wanting these because of the tight fit. But after 3 wears it has been getting loose I bought too and I have only
Problems with the black ones

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These leggings are OK—I think the seam lines are flattering and the pockets and the high rise are nice. However, the material is a lot thinner than I was expecting and the leggings and they don’t stay up well—they slide and ride down quite a bit. I went by the size chart and my current measurements, so I’m bummed. I don’t think ordering a smaller size would have really fixed the problem. Since I ordered them on sale I can’t return them so I’m trying to make them work for me, but I wish I hadn’t ordered them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Joomintoaction,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear the All The Right Places Pant II is not working out for you. column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Wish I knew to order down a size
column6: The quality of the pants is great and I truly love them for HIIT workouts. I did not have issues with threads coming undone. They are much more sweat wicking than any other pants I own. However, I am super disappointed by how much looser they fit after only a few wears. I recently ordered 2 pairs in navy and black and was so excited about them. I spent a lot of $ investing in these pants and don’t wear them anymore bc they don’t fit as they should. As a fitness instructor, I wear lululemon all the time but I don’t opt for these since they got baggy. It not only doesn’t look good but definitely doesn’t showcase the brand well. I wish I sized down to a 4 in these and definitely recommend others to do so.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wanted these so bad but had to return for a smaller size. Went into the store and they didn’t have the size I needed in the color I wanted. Ended up with another type which I’m very happy with. Will definitely give these another shot when they have a color I’d like in my size. I’m currently a size 8 but in lululemon leggings in need a 6 or they bunch around the back of my knees.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Just what I was looking for!
column6: Not see through, love the pockets, and the fit is just right!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Loved these pants until the seam started to tip after just a few wears. I pulled them out of my rotation and thought maybe I will just keep them for leisure wear/walking around, but the material around the seam then continued to deteriorate despite more gentle use. I wish I had returned them the second the seam started to go. Going to take them back to the store today to exchange. I have lulus from 5+ years ago that I still wear and are in great shape and have no issues with seams, not sure what is up with the new fabric as this is the second pair I have exchanged in just a few months. Pretty embarrassing to have to keep going back to the store, so, I think I might look at other lulu clothing items besides pants from now on....
column19: {'LL_response_content': "We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.\n\nWe want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do, and we'd love to make this experience right for you.If you need any further assistance, please feel free to give our GEC a call or SMS us at 1.877.263.9300 to continue this conversation.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 20, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love my All My Right Places Pant - I also have three pairs of the full length. They are incredibly comfortable, fit perfectly & work for yoga, running, hiking or just lounging around. I love them & would love even more solid colors.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
This was my first pair of lulu leggings and I was really not impressed. I kept having to pull them up throughout my hour workout, both on the treadmill and during bodyweight exercises. They also showed all of my sweat.. all of it, which is really not okay especially for the price.
I bought these with the intention of being able to workout in them, but after one workout, I don't think I will be wearing them to workout again.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These are seriously one of the most comfortable pants that I own from Lulu. I think I love these more than my align pants and I have over 12 of those! The honestly feel like a second skin, they have just enough compression in the right places. I do a lot of free weight training/squats and I don't have to worry about re-adjusting my pants during my workouts. They are great with sweat-wicking, and I love the pockets on the sides to slide my phone in. I promise these will not disappoint!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Recently I bought these, I was excited to use them, and within one hour, the seams started falling off! I read the reviews assuming "Oh that wont happen to me if I sized up", sadly, it did. I was super upset because I decided to INVEST in these leggings, which are not cheap. I was annoyed with customer service too because they were making me return it and receive a gift card as a refund. Worst part was that, I was using them for lounging, if they don't last for lounging, how will they last while working out? I only owned these for a day. First of all, it is inconvenient for me to take time to return this product when it was not my fault for the seams to fall off, I even sized up for it to avoid the problem. Second, why would I want a Lululemon gift card when their leggings let me down in the first hour. I definitely do not want to re-invest in these. I wanted to love them, but it definitely let me down.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi mmaGirl8,\nThanks for taking the time to write a review. We hear where you're coming from and I'm sorry to hear your pants haven't held up for you as expected. We have sent you an email outlining a few options. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 17, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
I bought these leggings about a year ago and was thrilled because they were my first pair from lulu. Not too long after I bought them, seams started to fray and the leggings were a bit sheer in some areas. I followed all wash instructions yet it still seemed like the leggings weren't holding up after each wash.
I took them into a store so they could reinforce the seams, but they seemed to do every seam except the one that was fraying the most, and all the seams popped when I put the leggings back on for the first time.
I have other gear that I can't live without from lulu, but these don't live up to the same quality, especially for the price.

Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 14, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Good, For the first two weeks
column6:
I had bought these pants from the mall about 3 weeks ago. I washed them a couple times, air dried them, and the bottoms of them completely frayed as if there was no inseam. I was very frustrated with the result so I threw them away.
Very poor stitching for such a high price.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love the fit of these leggings. They feel good, and have a very comfortable waistband/rise. I wear these more for athleisure looks than to work out in!
column15: wish it had side pockets for a cell phone

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Love the All the Right Places tights and this is not a knock but I ordered the antique bark and when it arrived, it was pretty purple. So just a heads up to anyone else considering this color.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Loved it, fell apart after 3rd use
column6: This was my first pair of Lululuemon leggings, and I loved them. They fit great, the pocket was excellent and it was good material. After the 3rd time wearing these leggings, I noticed that the stitching on the back pocket was completely coming off. There weren't any visible snags or anything, it just came undone. Considering these were $120+, it was a very disappointing waste of money.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These fit me like a glove! I have worn these to both Pilates and running on the treadmill and they do not move. The color is great. They feel comfortable and breathable. I'm able to run and stretch without sliding. The pocket for my phone is a game changer!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love the way these leggings look but after wearing them once they stretched out and now they don't stay up when I wear them. The seams are also starting to fray. Love Lulu but these leggings are not their best, especially for the price.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I ordered this pants online I immediately tried it on when it arrived. I couldn't take them off once I'd put them on. They fit perfectly, especially the high rise and inseam length and the zoned compression design are both flattering and really comfortable for my active lifestyle and/or lounging around the house.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Unfortunately, these just didn't hold up from (basically) day 1. The seams are fraying on the thighs...they become very loose within 1 wear. Yes - they look great...but the quality just doesn't match the price on these bad boys. When buying $130 leggings you'd expect them to last you at least a solid year of wear. Buyer beware.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I got these pants in white and was super excited. I bought these online but ordered my usual size 4. For reference I am 5'3" and 120 lbs. These were really tight and very unflattering. They show ANY imperfections you may have. I drove 45 mins to a store that had them in size 6 thinking that may solve the issue but even with the bigger size they were still very unflattering. I wish they made these without all those seams but I understand that if they weren't so thick they may be see through.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Great leggings for everyday wear and working out
column6:
These are a great fit and true to size!
I love the navy color and they are super flattering.
I am 5'3/5'4 and I wear a size 8, slender legs but a larger waist that hugs to my body in the right places, definitely will recommend this pant!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love these pants . They really do fit in all the right places !

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wanted to love these pants! The color is beautiful, they look great on my butt. However, I kept having to pull them up. During my workout and after. I expected more considering the price. I have worn them one time and they are already loose!! Not happy with this purchase.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
Soft comfortable material. Never feel like they are squeezing my body. So comfortable I don't even feel them.
Love the pockets!!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These are by far the best looking pants ever made by lululemon. They honor their name in every way possible. The only down side is the fact that I constantly have to pull the up, perhaps due to the sleekness of the fabric. That has not stopped me from owning every single color I have wanted though.
column15: they slide down in the middle of the workout

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Just love them. Fitted but with a lot of stretch. So far I’ve used them for running, heavy lifting, & yoga and they work perfectly for all 3.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: I wanted them to work so bad!
column6: I am relatively new to the lulu community and my friends have been encouraging me to get a pair of leggings. I broke down and bought a pair of the on pace crops. I was in love! Based on recommendation from my friends again I decided to buy the all the right places crop. I was disappointed with the pockets because when doing floor excises my phone would fall out (unlike my on pace crops) and after 2 washes the SEAMS started unraveling! I'm pretty annoyed with such pricey leggings being poorly stitched.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Good at first until the seam started to separate
column6: These are my first pair of Lululemon pants and I doubt I will purchase another pair after this. I have only worn these pants twice and washed them twice, hand wash and hang dry. I noticed that the seam on the right pocket is starting to separate. I purchased these pants for my cycling class, which I have not even worn them to yet. After paying $128 for these and not even wearing them to workout in yet I am extremely disappointed. I expected much better quality.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: i wear these pants allllll the time. "all the right places" is certainly the right name. by far my favorite lulu pants, keeps everything tight!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: While these are absolutely the most flattering leggings I have ever worn. After only two washes on cold and delicate and laying flat to dry the side pockets (which are great! Love having pockets!) are already sagging. Other than the pockets not laying flat (an ID or credit card would certainly fall out) the pants are great, dry fast, and look amazing.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Alexfineonline,\nThanks for taking the time to share this feedback. It's not good to hear that the pockets are not laying flat on your pants. I'd love to help you find a fix, so I've sent an email your way with some solutions.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 28, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: love but not the right length for my ankles
column6: Big fan of the Tight Stuff tight and was told All the Right Places would give me the support I like but would also be easier to put on. They were right on both accounts but the 28" inseam doesn't work for my skinny ankles and sadly, they were returned.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Love the fit, seams come apart too easily
column6: I own 30+ pairs of lululemon pants, plus 10+shorts, I am the biggest fan and customer. I had never bought an ATRP pant because at $128+tax and a 3 star rating I was nervous. I really wanted a navy pant and so I bought the bullet. I cannot love the fit more, but I wore them 1 time and had 2 seams already fraying. I wonder if this is more noticeable on these pants because they have so many more seams than others? However, I walked them right back into the store and they gave me a brand new pair after seeing the seams. That is good customer service. I am hopeful that the new pants don't wear so fast and if they don't I will be purchasing more of this pant.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I splurged a lot of $$$ on these at a Lululemon store, expecting the best. I got a size 10 and they fit great at the store (and for only the first couple of wears). I remember store clerks really pushing me to get it, and at the time, I was really excited. They held up great for the first couple wears. Around wash number 5 (about 3 weeks in), seams came loose, and had been slowly deteriorating. I followed all the washing/care instructions every time. The pants are now really loose and awkward fitting, nothing like when I bought them. They also pill SO fast and are see through. This is my first time purchasing Lululemon and I doubt I'll be back. I really hoped that these would hold up, because they truly felt great and the detailing on the leggings were wonderful. I'm not really sure what to do with them now.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey noodlenora,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the All The Right Places Pant II. We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we'd love to make this experience right for you. We’d love to turn this around and get you into gear that works for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 27, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: love these so much. i wear only these now when i work out. the side pockets are stellar. i never have to pull them up or adjust them throughout my workout. they can take all sorts of movement.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: When I first got them I was extremley excited! They fit perfectly. Only a couple wears and washes later, the was a hole froming in the seam :( Now, I cannot were these. Super dissapointed escpecially since I paid $130 for them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey dancerabby,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts, however I'm sorry to hear your All The Right Places Pant II has a hole and I'd love to work with you to find a resolution! Keep your eye out for an email from us, chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 26, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Great Leggings, but alot of Fraying
column6: I love these leggings so much. They're tight, have pockets, and are very flattering. Although I love them, they have been fraying at the inner seams (inner thigh) and this is quite unfortunate because they are on the more expensive side of LuluLemon leggings. I've probably worth them around 15 times and bought them in March or so, so I'm concerned how the leggings will hold up over time. Just be aware of this when purchasing these leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey dogaya,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear the All The Right Places Pant II are experiencing some seam issues. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 25, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought cropped and the full 28” version of ATRP and I can confidently say all the people saying it falls and need to pull it up constantly is because they bought the cropped version ( or defected one) considering function of this legging, it is the number one. It is very stretchy for yoga , amazingly hold shape for running and super durable for training! AND it has pockets and wicks sweat very well. I love the cool feeling the Luxtreme fabric gives and strategic seams lulu placed ... if you want multipurpose workout pant that lasts quite long time, try this! FYI, I am 5’4 height and full length wasn’t too long

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These pants fit like a glove! If I could I would buy all the colors!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I'm so in love with these. They fit just riggt, squat proof, hug my curves without being too tight and I love the pockets! They're great for training and lazy days.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: This is the definition of perfection. All the seam lines are in "all the right places" to help shape your body for you taking in the spots that are more difficult to trim while allowing for muscle definition and curve to be accentuated.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Love these pants. I am long legged with very narrow hipped but have a butt. These fit perfect. They hug and shape you just right. I'm 5 ft 5 1/2 125 lbs and wear a 2.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought these pants a few weeks ago. I loved the fit and feel and color when I bought them. But the second time I wore them to yoga, the waist started rolling down and the pants needed to be constantly pulled up. I got them in my normal size and they fit well in the store. It's SO sad because they are SO expensive to stretch out after only 2 wears. I really want to buy lulu but it's getting harder and harder when the quality is so poor for the big price tag.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on All The Right Places Pant II.\nOh dear, I’m sorry to see you’re having some trouble with your gear—that's definitely disappointing. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 21, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I'll start with the positives, or should I say positive. These leggings make your butt look amazing but its a catch 22 because your butt will only look amazing on the first couple of wears. After that, they stretch out severely and as a result, fall down constantly. I can't believe I was sucked into to buying them by the employees at the store I visited. I have only owned them for about a year and this is what has happened. I might as well as go to target and get leggings that will last me just as long for a fourth of the price.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey lululululemon1,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear the All The Right Places Pant II have not held up for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 18, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
These are the best pants i have ever worn! This is the first item i have ever bought from Luluemon. I decided to buy these because, I wanted pants that fit snug, but i also could move in them and stretch without feeling like i was stretching the fabric or afraid to rip the fabric somewhere and from the description and the reviews these looked like they might work.I am so happy i purchased these, because i was not let down, these are the BEST PANTS EVER! I feel so amazing in them. I can move and stretch without worrying about destroying the fabric, they feel amazing, but they snug at the same time, and they make my butt look fantastic! I love them!
Totally recommend these!!!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Do yourself a favor, buy a pair. They are AWESOME. Love the compression. Love the fabric. Love the pockets. LOVE how they make my butt look :) Not at all see thru, I have to question some of these reviews. Fabric seems pretty durable, I've had mine for months, and wear and wash them at least twice a week and they are perfect. My only complaint was they were a bit too long on me but lululemon will alter them for free for you. They are worth every penny!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: See through tights...have a hole after one wear!
column6: I have 20+ pairs of Lulu pants, and I've never had an issue. This material is thin, see through, and easily snagged. After one wear to the gym, and one very careful wash/air dry (as I do with all of my Lulu products), the seams were ripping & there was a snag/hole in the knee. All not "squat proof" - you can see right through these things. Not impressed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey RunCLE,\nOh no! We are sorry to hear you are experiencing coverage issues with your All The Right Places Pant II. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. We have sent you an email outlining a few options.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 15, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Best workout pant I’ve ever owned. I love the no zipper on the waist for mat work/distraction free workouts. These pockets are amazing. Literally love wearing these all the time— for HiT, casual wear, going to sports games (since the plethora of colors is amazing and I have pants to match so many things!), concerts, you name it. Plus, these are the most flattering pant and look phenomenal on everyone I’ve ever seen wear them. I always get compliments at the gym or wherever I go when I wear these. I wear these pants almost daily for everything (except my job). Buy these— you won’t regret it.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Amazing! My favorite pant thus far. Holds everything in without feeling too constricted and looks so feminine also has the pockets that I love. Thank you lululemon.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I was really excited about these pants. I loved working out with the pockets on the sides that were able to fit my iPhone X. I purchased these leggings about two months ago and I'm disappointed that they haven't been able to last. After a leg day, I had decided to wash the leggings like I wash all my lulus (cold water, air dry). The fabric in the upper leg region straight up tore so now there is a giant hole in the back of the leggings. I'm really sad because I expected the leggings to last much longer after spending $128. Super sad :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey kperez1813,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love these pants. The detail in these make you butt look so good! I love these for spinning on my Peloton!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: This guest did not provide a text review.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I have owned both the navy and black colors of this pant. I was so happy to see the white color released, and purchased them as soon as I could. However, I was surprisingly disappointed. The white color appears to be much thicker than my other two, and were very uncomfortable when I wore them to class. I am also continuously having to be pulling them up.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi AbGab,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to read of your experience. I'd love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I've sent an email to you outlining the next steps.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 8, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: BEST leggings for training! SQUAT PROOF
column6: I've owned a pair for about 2 years already and they are barely wearing out. I still wear them weekly for the gym. I typically weight train, run, or use these on a regular day. They are so comfortable and NOT see through. They are definitely pricey but WORTH it. The side pockets are very useful I have an iPhone 7 plus which fits perfectly. Go buy a pair you won't regret it!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I absolutely loved the fit of these when I first purchased them but after only a few month the waistband is becoming extremely loose which is so disappointing because I thought I finally found the perfect gym leggings. now I try not to wear them more than once a week to the gym because I feel like they're are going to continue to loosen. pretty bummed :/
column15: loose at the waist after a short time

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I rarely pay full price for anything but I saw these on a girl at the gym and had to have them. I absolutely love them. They are extremely flattering and were perfect for my marathon training. Only thing I would change would be to add an internal drawstring. For the first few miles I was constantly hiking them up but once I got nice and sweaty they were fine. I ordered my normal size in bottoms and I am curvy so I have a booty and bigger thighs. I am 5'10 and weight 155 pounds and ordered a size 6 and it was perfect.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: One legging to rule them all
column6:
Best leggings that have ever graced my quads. Slight compression fit and very flattering rise+seam placement. I have worn these 3x a week for two months to kickboxing and they've held up to some serious abuse throwing knees and kicks against the heavy bag. No pilling, no tears.
I am 5'10, 135lbs, and wear a size 2 in these though I am a 4/6 in most other Lulu bottoms.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: I LOVE My All the Right Places Pant
column6: I read the reviews prior to purchasing my ALL THE RIGHT PLACES pants. I am 5'8 and I typically wear them with a cuff rolled up at the ankle. I have worn them at least a dozen times and they are definitely my favorite workout, walking, dancing and just everyday wear about pants. They always stay in place and I get so many compliments. I'm looking forward to adding more colors to my wardrobe.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: this tights are excellent, they are opaque and thick. I love how they highlight the legs and bum. the seems started to come undone which its a bit of a shame, but other than that would totally recommend.

column6: HELLO LULULEMON....if you're not pregnant, don't buy these! Reinforce the waistband and add a drawstring if you intend to continue producing these. I bought 4 pairs of these online. column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I want to love these pants. I did for about an hour and then realized that they will not stay up. I have worn them three times now and I cannot even wear them at all. They have this odd pull down effect. Just walking in them they start to inch down. I have to constantly pull them up every five ten minutes-so embarrassing. I think they have too much elastic in the lower region that causes this.
column15: impossible to wear let alone work out in

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Constantly disappointed with Lulu products, these pants weren't any different. I purposefully bought these leggings to train in and I couldn't even make it to the end of my workout because I was constantly having to yank on the waistband to keep them from falling down and readjusting. The pants are also very shiny and the seems are in unflattering places. I want my money back. This is not what I expect when I drop $100+ on a single piece of workout gear

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These were my first pair of Lululemon leggings. I knew as soon as I got them that the material of these leggings are far superior to the low end leggings that I owned. However, as soon as I started wearing them the stitching started coming undone and they started pilling badly. After only a few months of wear two small holes started forming. Now I have two moderately sized holes on both legs of the pants that keep me from wearing the leggings. I was so excited to finally get a pair of Lululemon leggings, but now I have spent almost 140 dollars for pants that I can't even wear.

I am sorry to hear that the All The Right Places Pant II *28" is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 11, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: My mom bought these for me as a present and when I tried them on I loved them. They fit very nicely (except for the length which I usually have difficulty with since I am petite). I thought that the seams and pockets are beautifully placed. However, after wearing these leggings on several occasions as well as washing them, I have found bad pilling and the stitching has even come undone in more than one area. I couldn't believe that they deteriorated so rapidly. I have purchased several pairs of bottoms from lulu and enjoyed them all, but I am sad to say it was not the case with these tights.

We\'re sorry to hear that you\'ve experienced pilling with your All The Right Places Pant II *28". We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 7, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: When I first got these pants in black, I was so happy cause I'd been wanting them forever. I love the pocket and the way they make my butt look. But after a month or so (probably about 4-5 washes) I noticed that they were loose on me and I constantly had to pull them up. Thought I might've lost weight but nope lol. I kinda brushed it off and figured maybe next time I should try a 4 instead of a 6, so I tried on a 4 at the store and there was no way in heck I could wear it without my skin showing through. That being said, I ended up ordering a 6 again in another color online, and just tried it on and woah--they're so much tighter than my black ones! It's not my imagination. They definitely stretched :( I always follow the care instructions (as I do with all my lulus) It's super disappointing cause these are $128. I'm not even sure if I'm going to keep the one I just got because I hate pulling my pants up after each set of squats.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Thanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us.\nI'm sorry to hear of the retention loss that you're experiencing on your pants and can understand why you're not pleased. We're eager to work out a resolution, so I'm sending you an email to chat more.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 6, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I am SO disappointed!!! They only lasted 3 months before getting 2 holes!!!! This fit is my absolute favorite. I love the pockets and the high waisted shape, they also look great on me. I have a pair of these in the cropped ones and then decided to get the longer length too. I took amazing care of them like I do with all my lulus, I have 2 other pairs (one was a gift). I have had these other pairs for a year and a half with no problems at all. Those are still in like new condition. I am very mad about these $128 leggings not lasting! Like come on I trust this brand to have good long lasting quality and thats why I buy from them! I had faith that investing my money on these leggings would lead me to be able to have them for longer than a couple months!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Initially I purchased a size 4, since that is what I wear in aligns, but I didn't realize--then--that aligns stretch out more than the other leggings. I sent them back for a 6 and they fit like a dream. They don't budge on my waist, but they move with my body. I was concerned about the integrity of the seams, initially, but thus far I have had no issues. They are insanely flattering--whenever I'm bloated or just "feeling fat", I wear these and I feel so good. They hold me in without squeezing the life out of me. If I could only have one pair of leggings out of all of the leggings that I own, it would be these. My only dislike is that I got these back when there were only a few colors to choose from. I will be getting at least one more pair.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Great for a while - until they tore
column6:
These leggings were my FAVORITE for high sweat, intense cardio activities. The high rise waistband is super comfortable and the pockets on the upper thigh are AMAZING.
However, after pristine care -- wash on cold, never drying- the fabric in the thigh just straight up tore. This isn't even in a high-friction or super tight area of the pant. It's my front thigh. Now there is a giant hole and one small hole right next to each other. I expected these to last more than a few months for $100. Poor quality lulu.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'We appreciate your feedback regarding the All The Right Places Pant II *28".\nIt sounds like you know how to take care of your gear, so this shouldn\'t be happening. We\'ll be reaching out via email, so keep your eyes peeled on your inbox.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 20, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Sadly disappointed but don't want to be!
column6: I read a ton of reviews before purchasing these. A lot of reviews said they stretch so to size down. I did, and mine don't seem to be stretching like other peoples did. I would be much more comfortable in my correct size (4). My other issue with these are I wore them once and the stitching was coming out in one spot. For the money spent on these pants I shouldn't have either problem. Wish I could have a do over for at least my right size.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6:
When I first put these leggings on they fit amazingly but throughout the day they stretch out so much that I feel like I have to constantly pull them up. This means that I don't use the pockets later in the day because it increased how quickly the pants fall down.
It is so disappointing because they look and feel so perfect in the morning but by lunchtime, they are just a hassle.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Finally a pair that holds it shape
column6: I’ve tried dozens of styles and these are finally holding up. I am a size 6 and they fit perfectly. Tight enough to stay up and perfectly comfortable. Love the true navy color. Highly recommend.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Buy a size up in white!!!!
column6: I have these pants in three colors. They look great on my body shape and I have yet to find pants that flatter my figure as well as these do. I machine wash them and let them air dry to prevent pilling, although some pilling is inevitable. I decided to buy another pair in white since I love them so much. I purchased my typical size 4 and am extremely disappointed. They were waaaayyyyy to tight. I had already removed the tag since I have 3 other pairs assuming these would also fit. Not sure if they completely changed sizing or if it’s only for the white. Overall the white seems to have way less stretch compared to the black, navy, and teal ones I own. I’m really upset I can’t even exchange them since I removed the tag.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey NYCKari,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the All The Right Places Pant II *28". column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I absolutely LOVE these leggings. The compression and the high rise make these the most flattering of all the styles. They make me look 10 lbs lighter, easily. I only wish that the length were shorter. For us petite girls (for reference, I am 5'4"), these are way too long with lots of fabric bunched around the ankle...not a great look. PLEASE make these in a 25" length.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: Bought these on the recommendation of my daughter, but I just don't like them. They absolutely will not stay up! I'm constantly pulling them up only to have them droop within minutes. Very very disappointed considering they are one of the more expensive styles.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi noobie,\nWe hear your disappointment with the your gear not staying in place. I'd love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I've sent an email to you outlining the next steps.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 10, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: its just look really good !!u won't disappointed i want all the colorsLOL

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: My favorite leggings! Super comfy (love the high rise) and they wash up super well. Very flattering too! Have had mine for 6+ months and they still look good as new. And an extra bonus for those of you with pets, they don't collect pet hair. : ) Excited to add one more color to my collection!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought these in store a few weeks ago because these don't have a front seam which helps avoid certain awkward shape from forming. I wore these twice, they felt great. They were washed twice with cold water, on gentle cycle and air-dried. Now the waistband is so loose and I have to constantly pull them up when I walk and that's really annoying!! I've bought a few other pairs before and they are still doing fine. I'm not sure what's wrong with these.. disappointed especially since these are more expensive than the others.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: The most flattering leggings- I own 4 pairs! But they don't hold up well...
column6: I thin these are the most flattering leggings lululemon makes and I've purchased four pairs. However, I've found that the thread in the seams frays after the first 3 - 5 washes (I don't dry them) and I've had to cut threads on them several times where they've come out of the seams. They also stretch out pretty quickly. Great leggings, but not the most durable.
column14: fit cut in front pockets on side

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These are by far my favorite Lululemon leggings. Between the leggings and the crops, I have at least 7 pairs. A couple of them are over 2 years old and still going strong. I did have an issue with the stitching on my most recent purchase, but I will plan on taking it back to the store and having them fix it right up for me. :) I even purchased the white, fearful that they might be see through, but they are lined and perfect!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I bought these less than a month ago and they are already pilling and to make it worse there is a hole in the seam on the upper leg. I normally love Lululemon leggings and never had a problem before but these are terrible.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I really wanted to love these leggings after hearing everyone rant and rave about how amazing they are in reviews and on instagram. But these just were not the quality that I was expecting. I wore them maybe twice and thought that maybe I had finally found a pair of leggings that I could comfortably rely on for all of my workouts. But after washing them a third time (I only wash in cold water, the leggings have never entered the dryer) some of the threads are starting to fray a bit and the fit is already much looser than they were when I first purchased them. If I knew that these leggings were going to stretch out I probably would have sized down so that I would have more of a compression fit. But I can't even get a work out in these without becoming incredibly frustrated with having to pull them up all the time. I'm just really disappointed that I paid so much money for something that really wasn't worth my time. I should have stuck with lululemon products that I already know and love.

Please keep an eye on your inbox as I\'ll be reaching out shortly to connect.', 'LL_response_date': 'May 28, 2018'}

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I love these leggings! They're perfect for yoga and pilates. The cut and the seams are designed to create the most flattering shape. And the side pocket is perfect for carrying my phone if I need to. I have the midnight blue pair, and they've barely faded even though I wear these about twice a week.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: These leggings are so great because they make everything look soo good! I wear these at the gym or i'll wear them to run errands, go out, and I even wore them to Church. I love these leggings because the pockets are so convenient and I have gotten a lot of complements in them! The only thing is that they're a bit too long for me and I have noticed snagging on some areas. Overall, these leggings are amazing and I recommend them!

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column6: I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing these! I loved them at first, but after only two washes, the stitching is coming out in the waistband. It looks like a lot of other people are having this problem.. which is such a bummer because everything else I've ever purchased from Lululemon has been impeccably made. I do love the side pockets on this pant.

column6: I wanted to love these pants but I have to pull them up every 15 steps, so they're definitely not made for running in my opinion, and the seams started to unravel after only 2 or 3 wears. Very disappointed with the quality of these pants.

column1: All The Right Places Pant II 28"
column5: Great Look, Great Fit, But It Doesn't Last
column6: These fit great and they look great. But a few washes and wears in and they're stretched/baggy to the point they're almost unwearable. I love the style and the fit but $128 leggings shouldn't be baggy after normal wear.
